title: UK weather: heatwave spreads to Scotland and Northern Ireland
description: Temperatures are expected to be reach more than 30C in large swathes of the country.
content:
Northern Ireland and Scotland will see temperatures soar as the UK's third heatwave of the year spreads across the country.

title: Rachel Reeves autumn Budget will see significant tax rises
description: Repeatedly borrowing more is not a long-term solution to rising day-to-day spending pressures.
content:
Two very different reports have reignited UK economic gloom over the past four days.

title: Air India crash: Fuel switches cut off before crash, preliminary report says
description: In the cockpit voice recording, one of the pilots is heard asking the other why he "did the cut-off".
content:
Report sets out what happened - but not why
Theo Leggett
BBC International Business Correspondent
The preliminary report sets out what happened. What we don’t know is why.

title: Katie Taylor outpoints Amanda Serrano in tactical finale to classic fistic trilogy
description: Irish fighter earns majority decision at Madison Square Garden to stay undisputed champion and go 3-0 in classic trilogy
content: Katie Taylor outboxed Amanda Serrano over 10 tense, tactical rounds on Friday night to win a majority decision and retain her undisputed junior welterweight title, sealing a 3-0 sweep in one of the most significant rivalries in women’s boxing history... [2375 chars]
